name: Rocket Theater Rehearsal
description:
Rocket Theater is a 2D stunt game where you use explosives to jump around the map doing tricks. Combine multiple tricks together to form massive combos and destroy the global leader-boards.

The current version is 1.1 the Balance Event.  The game is currently discontinued due to changes in the team's availability among other things.

Features

  • Multiple Characters to utilize and maps to explore.
  • A campaign with 12 levels and medal rankings.
  • A Free play mode where you can compete against other players on the leader-boards.
  • A journal that tracks your stats.

Anyone is free to upload user-made content of our game involving videos, screenshots, live-streams, and other forms of media.

We hope you enjoy the action packed adventures on Planet Parkour!

Aloe Vertex Studio

Producer, Programmer, Marketing, Audio: Ian Feldschneider - @ChromeWingDev

Artist, Level Designer, Marketing, Audio: Lawrence Granroth - @huttyblue
